article: Computers have done us a lot since they turned up. In the future they will play a more important part in many  _  , such as education, transport, personal lives, scientific research and so on. Nowadays computers are being  _  in agriculture and industry and can help the farmers to  _  the conditions of the plants. More and more computers will come into our daily life with the  _  of science and technology. If you want to change money or pay your electricity bills, you won't have to go to the  bank  . A computer and a telephone will help you. It can also help you to do the housework and it can even  _  human voices and carry out the instructions. It is  _  that the majority of the labour force will work at home. People will be able to use the videophone for conferences. This can help us to save a lot of energy and  _  . It is said that trains in Japan will have no  _  , because they'll be well  _  by computers, which can also tell the best  _  between trains.
